key_title: Key to the subspecies of Asterolasia trymalioides

Key to the families of Dicotyledons

Key to the species of Asterolasia

leads.lead_text: Leaves, stems and especially, new growth densely covered in stalked, stellate hairs with stalks up to 1.7 mm long and stellae up to 1.5 mm diam., the stalks persisting as sparse to moderately dense tubercles or short bristles; erect to spreading shrub to 1 m high; known in Victoria only from near Mt Bowen near Bonang

Leaves and stems variously hairy when young but stalks of stellate hairs, when retained, mostly < 0.5 mm long and stellae 0.3–0.8 mm diam., adaxial surface of leaves soon glabrous, but with scattered tubercles; low, spreading shrub rarely more than 50 cm high; higher subalps and alps
